messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Engine running, if you ssstill have power isssuesss contact me

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a swarm of mice have descended into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Vore Factory's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Phillip Poehl (Head of Personnel)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">there are a bunch of autistic children runing around the station pretending to have jobs but they are realy just abunch of little assholes so um how about some mass genocide of small autistic children people say they care about them but they dont they dont so yeah lets just commit mass genocide back to you later on fucktard news</font>

messages.author: FRA.G.M.E.N.T (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Engeenering does job, Mirical or sign from god?</font>
